name: Makina
description:
Objective

A giant monster tries to defeat a small will-o-wisp in a city, both players have to defeat each other using very different means...

The giant has to shoot energy to annihilate the small one while the will-o-wisp must destroy the life crystals of the giant before being terminated.

Features

PC Player :

  • Move around
  • Destroy crystals
  • Take elevators
  • Clone themselves
  • Teleport

VR Player :

  • Move around
  • Shoot energy beams
  • Throw beacons that detect the PC player
  • Inspire fear
Requirements
  • 2 Players
  • 2 Computers
  • 1 Oculus Quest 2 headset
